name: James Naiden
bio: James Naiden is the author of Summer Poems (2002), and three recently published novels: Scuttlebone (2011), Crystals (2011), and  The Chafings of Mortals (2011). Has published reviews and literary essays in other publications, including Rain Taxi, the North Stone Review, and the Minneapolis Star Tribune. Naiden has lived in Minneapolis, Minnesota since 1970, where he works part-time as an actor and voice talent.
